summary.span: L'espace de noms System.Xml.Xsl prend en charge les transformations XSLT (Extensible Stylesheet Transformation).

span.span: The System.Xml.Xsl namespace provides support for Extensible Stylesheet Transformation (XSLT) transforms.

summary.span: Il est conforme à la recommandation du W3C intitulée XSL Transformations (XSLT) Version 1.0 (www.w3.org/TR/xslt).

span.span: It supports the W3C XSL Transformations (XSLT) Version 1.0 Recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/xslt).
